description: Mondo is the name of two fictional comic book characters that have appeared in the Marvel Comics series Generation X.
name: Mondo
powers: Capable of absorbing organic or inorganic material into his cellular structure to take on the properties of whatever he touches until it is "digested" from his system
Also capable of transport through organic matter such as dirt.

Capable of absorbing organic or inorganic material into his cellular structure to take on the properties of whatever he touches until it is "digested" from his system; also capable of transport through organic matter such as dirt.
